data.claim: Epiphanys Global Bridge (brand: "Epiphiny Flow"): Diaspora communities + global investment/business networking platform. Vite + React SPA + Supabase + shadcn-ui. Internationalization with 7 languages (EN, FR, AR, ZH, ES, DE, HI). Lovable-managed project. Edge functions for AI chatbot, framework generator, emails. Port 8080.
